keyword: how many calories in 6 oz chicken breast
title: How Many Calories in 6 oz Chicken Breast?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in 6 oz chicken breast, plus detailed nutrition facts like protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meal prep.
h1: How Many Calories in 6 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 6 oz â‰ˆ 170 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~281 kcal and ~53 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 6 oz cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 281 kcal for skinless, boneless, grilled or roasted.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 6 oz chicken breast?
Does 6 oz chicken breast have carbs?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain cooked chicken breast.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in 6 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Grilling or roasting keeps it low; frying or adding oil can add 100+ kcal.

faqs.q: Is 6 oz chicken breast raw or cooked weight?
faqs.a: These values are for cooked weight; raw is about 25% heavier due to moisture loss.
